Thank you for this upload!
I downloaded and installed it; it works perfectly except for the images: they all look weird, shades of greys, blues, red, absolutely not normal. I'm running Windows 7 64bits and my graphic card is an ATI Radeon HD 4650.
For information, I've got the first game on dvd when I try to launch it after installation I get an error message saying more or less "can't find graphics something". Months back this game was working perfectly.
Anyone has an idea what's going on there?
Thank you.
